Migrating Cinder volumes between OpenStack environments using shared NFS storage
/post/2015-09-29-migrating-cinder-volumes-between-openstack-environments/ 2015-09-29T00:00:00+0000 2015-09-29T00:00:00+0000 Many of the upgrade guides for OpenStack focus on in-place upgrades to your OpenStack environment. Some organizations may opt for a less risky (but more hardware intensive) option of setting up a parallel environment, and then migrating data into the new environment. In this article, we look at how to use Cinder backups with a shared NFS volume to facilitate the migration of Cinder volumes between two different OpenStack environments.
